verses.text: \w Behold|strong="H2005"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w will|strong="H1471"\w* \w uphold|strong="H8551"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*: \w my|strong="H5414"\w* elect, \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* delighteth \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*: \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w have|strong="H1471"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*, \w he|strong="H5414"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w bring|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Gentiles|strong="H1471"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w cry|strong="H6817"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* respect \w to|strong="H8085"\w* person, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w abroad|strong="H2351"\w*.

\w The|strong="H7665"\w* \w bruised|strong="H7533"\w* \w reed|strong="H7070"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w break|strong="H7665"\w*, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* smoking \w flax|strong="H6594"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w quench|strong="H3518"\w*: \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w bring|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* unto \w truth|strong="H0571"\w*.

\w He|strong="H5704"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* sad, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* troublesome, \w till|strong="H5704"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w islands|strong="H0339"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w wait|strong="H3176"\w* \w for|strong="H0776"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w*.

\w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w created|strong="H1254"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w stretched|strong="H5186"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w out|strong="H5186"\w*: \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w established|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* things \w that|strong="H3068"\w* spring \w out|strong="H5186"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w*: \w that|strong="H3068"\w* giveth \w breath|strong="H7307"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* tread \w thereon|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H1471"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* thee \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w justice|strong="H6664"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w taken|strong="H2388"\w* thee \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* preserved thee. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w have|strong="H1471"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* thee \w for|strong="H7121"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w for|strong="H7121"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* \w light|strong="H0216"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w Gentiles|strong="H1471"\w*:

\w That|strong="H5869"\w* thou mightest \w open|strong="H6491"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w blind|strong="H5787"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w bring|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w prisoner|strong="H0616"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w prison|strong="H3608"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w them|strong="H3318"\w* \w that|strong="H5869"\w* \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w prison|strong="H3608"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w this|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*: \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w another|strong="H0312"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w praise|strong="H8416"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w graven|strong="H6456"\w* \w things|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w things|strong="H7223"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w were|strong="H7223"\w* \w first|strong="H7223"\w*, \w behold|strong="H2009"\w* \w they|strong="H2962"\w* are \w come|strong="H0935"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w new|strong="H2319"\w* \w things|strong="H7223"\w* \w do|strong="H0589"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w declare|strong="H5046"\w*: \w before|strong="H2962"\w* \w they|strong="H2962"\w* \w spring|strong="H6779"\w* \w forth|strong="H6779"\w*, \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H0589"\w* \w make|strong="H8085"\w* \w you|strong="H5046"\w* head \w them|strong="H0853"\w*.

\w Sing|strong="H7891"\w* ye \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* Lora \w a|strong="H0776"\w* \w new|strong="H2319"\w* \w song|strong="H7892"\w*, \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w praise|strong="H8416"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w from|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* ends \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: \w you|strong="H3381"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H4393"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* therein: ye \w islands|strong="H0339"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* ye \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w them|strong="H3381"\w*.

Let \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w desert|strong="H4057"\w* \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* thereof \w be|strong="H5375"\w* \w exalted|strong="H5375"\w*: Cedar \w shall|strong="H2022"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* houses: ye \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* Petra, \w give|strong="H5375"\w* praise, \w they|strong="H5375"\w* \w shall|strong="H2022"\w* \w cry|strong="H7442"\w* \w from|strong="H2022"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w top|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H7760"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w declare|strong="H5046"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w praise|strong="H8416"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w islands|strong="H0339"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w stir|strong="H5782"\w* \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w zeal|strong="H7068"\w*: \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w shout|strong="H7321"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w cry|strong="H7321"\w*: \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w prevail|strong="H1396"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*.

I \w have|strong="H3205"\w* \w always|strong="H5769"\w* held \w my|strong="H3162"\w* peace, I \w have|strong="H3205"\w* I \w kept|strong="H2814"\w* silence, I \w have|strong="H3205"\w* \w been|strong="H5769"\w* patient, I will speak now as \w a|strong="H3205"\w* woman \w in|strong="H3205"\w* labour: I will destroy, \w and|strong="H5769"\w* swallow up at once.

\w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w will|strong="H2022"\w* \w lay|strong="H7760"\w* waste \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* \w and|strong="H2022"\w* \w hills|strong="H1389"\w*, \w and|strong="H2022"\w* \w will|strong="H2022"\w* \w make|strong="H7760"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w grass|strong="H6212"\w* \w to|strong="H2022"\w* \w wither|strong="H3001"\w*: \w and|strong="H2022"\w* \w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w will|strong="H2022"\w* \w turn|strong="H7760"\w* \w rivers|strong="H5104"\w* \w into|strong="H5104"\w* \w islands|strong="H0339"\w*, \w and|strong="H2022"\w* \w will|strong="H2022"\w* \w dry|strong="H3001"\w* \w up|strong="H3001"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* standing \w pools|strong="H0098"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6440"\w* \w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w will|strong="H1697"\w* \w lead|strong="H1869"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w blind|strong="H5787"\w* \w into|strong="H4285"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w which|strong="H0428"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*: \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w in|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w paths|strong="H5410"\w* \w which|strong="H0428"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w were|strong="H0428"\w* ignorant \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w will|strong="H1697"\w* \w make|strong="H7760"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w walk|strong="H1869"\w*: \w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w will|strong="H1697"\w* \w make|strong="H7760"\w* \w darkness|strong="H4285"\w* \w light|strong="H0216"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* crooked \w things|strong="H1697"\w* straight: \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w things|strong="H1697"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H1870"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* forsaken \w them|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w They|strong="H0559"\w* \w are|strong="H0430"\w* \w turned|strong="H5472"\w* \w back|strong="H0268"\w*: let \w them|strong="H0859"\w* \w be|strong="H0430"\w* greatly \w confounded|strong="H0954"\w*, \w that|strong="H0559"\w* \w trust|strong="H0982"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w a|strong="H0559"\w* \w graven|strong="H6459"\w* \w thing|strong="H1322"\w*, \w that|strong="H0559"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w a|strong="H0559"\w* molten \w thing|strong="H1322"\w*: \w You|strong="H0859"\w* \w are|strong="H0430"\w* \w our|strong="H0430"\w* \w god|strong="H0430"\w*.

\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w*, ye \w deaf|strong="H2795"\w*, \w and|strong="H7200"\w*, ye \w blind|strong="H5787"\w*, \w behold|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w you|strong="H7200"\w* \w may|strong="H8085"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w*.

\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w blind|strong="H5787"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*? \w or|strong="H0518"\w* \w deaf|strong="H2795"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w whom|strong="H4310"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H5650"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w*? \w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w blind|strong="H5787"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* sold? \w or|strong="H0518"\w* \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w blind|strong="H5787"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*?

Thou \w that|strong="H7200"\w* seest \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w things|strong="H0241"\w*, wilt thou \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w observe|strong="H8104"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w*? thou \w that|strong="H7200"\w* hast \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* \w open|strong="H6491"\w*, wilt thou \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*?

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* willing \w to|strong="H3068"\w* sanctify \w him|strong="H1431"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w magnify|strong="H1431"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w exalt|strong="H1431"\w* \w it|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w But|strong="H1961"\w* \w this|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* robbed \w and|strong="H7725"\w* wasted: \w they|strong="H0559"\w* \w are|strong="H0369"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* snare \w of|strong="H1004"\w* young \w men|strong="H5971"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w they|strong="H0559"\w* \w are|strong="H0369"\w* \w hid|strong="H2244"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w prisons|strong="H3608"\w*: \w they|strong="H0559"\w* \w are|strong="H0369"\w* \w made|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w prey|strong="H0957"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w none|strong="H0369"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* \w them|strong="H7725"\w*: \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w spoil|strong="H0957"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w none|strong="H0369"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* saith: \w Restore|strong="H7725"\w*.

\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w there|strong="H2063"\w* \w among|strong="H4310"\w* \w you|strong="H8085"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w will|strong="H4310"\w* \w give|strong="H0238"\w* \w ear|strong="H0238"\w* \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w*, \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w will|strong="H4310"\w* attend \w and|strong="H8085"\w* hearken \w for|strong="H8085"\w* times \w to|strong="H8085"\w* come?

\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* \w spoil|strong="H0962"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* robbers? hath \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w himself|strong="H3808"\w*, \w against|strong="H2398"\w* \w whom|strong="H4310"\w* \w we|strong="H8085"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w*? \w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w would|strong="H0014"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* hearkened \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0639"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* hath \w poured|strong="H8210"\w* \w out|strong="H8210"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* indignation \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w fury|strong="H2534"\w*, \w and|strong="H0639"\w* \w a|strong="H7760"\w* strong \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*, \w and|strong="H0639"\w* hath burnt \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w round|strong="H5439"\w* \w about|strong="H5439"\w*, \w and|strong="H0639"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*: \w and|strong="H0639"\w* \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w fire|strong="H3857"\w*, \w and|strong="H0639"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w understood|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*.
